attributes.action: Encourage the media to highlight the problem some women have gaining weight and to stop them refering to thin women as 'disgusting' and 'unnatural'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alot of women including myself have trouble GAINING weight and are constantly forced to beleive they should be ashamed of their bodies due to the media coverage on thin women. Everywhere I turn there are articles on how to lose weight and which celebrity has lost the most weight and am made to beleive that I am not a 'real' woman and do not have a 'real' figure. 
People are not made aware of the other side to the big weight debate and therefore feel that is alright to comment on my size and do not feel it is hurtful to do so.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
